summary.span: Returns a that indicates whether the list must be rendered as a table.

span.span: Returns a that indicates whether the list must be rendered as a table.

returns.span: if the list must be rendered as a table; otherwise, .

span.span: if the list must be rendered as a table; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以覆寫，才能變更轉譯清單檢視的方式。This method can be overridden in order to change the manner in which the list view is rendered. > [!NOTE] > 即使方法會傳回`true`、 目標裝置可能不支援資料表、 在此情況下的清單檢視將不會轉譯為資料表。Even if the method returns `true`, the target device might not support tables, in which case the list view will not be rendered as a table. 方法會傳回`Boolean`，指出是否在目標裝置 畫面中，符合指定的資料表而屬性類別會傳回`Boolean`，指出是否在裝置完全支援資料表。The method returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the specified table will fit on the target device screen, whereas the property of the class returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the device supports tables at all.
